item.title: Odds and sods
item.description: Compile of KDE4 keeps failing on FreeBSD 9.1 whether by # cd /usr/ports/x11/kde4 # make install clean or # pkg_add -r kde4 after STOP tried # cd /usr/ports/x11/xorg # make install clean –> OK. Then: # cd /usr/ports/x11/kde4 # make install clean Works like a charm! ⌘ – ⌘ – ⌘ – Cmd ⌥ – ⌥ – ⌥ – Opt / Alt ⇧ – ⇧ – ⇧ – Shift
